mapper.select: SELECT U.US_ID,U.US_NAME,D.DI_NAME AS SEX,U.US_AGE,DI.DI_NAME, TO_CHAR(U.US_BIRTHDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') BIRTHDAY,U.US_PHONE, U.US_ADDRESS,U.US_NATIVEPLACE,U.US_MEMO FROM T_USER U INNER JOIN T_DICT D ON D.DI_CODE = U.US_SEX INNER JOIN T_DICT DI ON DI.DI_CODE = U.US_BLOODTYPE INNER JOIN T_CARD C ON C.CA_USER_ID = U.US_ID WHERE D.DI_TYPE = 'SEX' AND DI.DI_TYPE = 'BLOODTYPE' AND C.CA_NUMBER = #{cardNum}

SELECT MR.MR_NUMBER,IR.IR_ITS_NAME,IR_ITS_PRICE,DEP.DEP_NAME, DI.DI_NAME,TO_CHAR(MR.MR_BIL_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BILTIME FROM T_MEC_RECORD MR INNER JOIN T_DICT DI ON DI.DI_CODE = MR.MR_STATE INNER JOIN T_CARD CA ON CA.CA_ID = MR.MR_CA_ID INNER JOIN T_ITEMS_RECORD IR ON IR.IR_MR_ID = MR.MR_ID INNER JOIN T_DEPARTMENT DEP ON DEP.DEP_ID = IR.IR_DEP_ID WHERE DI.DI_TYPE = 'MECSTATE' AND CA.CA_NUMBER = #{cardNum}
